event.title: Talk "An endangered species: computer as a universal machine" at Linuxtag in Berlin, Germany

body.p: On 8 May at 20:30 during the Linuxtag, Matthias Kirschner will give a speech about computers as general purpose machines and the dangers of limiting the rights of their owners. The talk, in German, will be held at Stage 11 from 20:30 to 21:00. Attendence after 18:00 is free of charge.
